name: TechnoCube
tagline: Intersection of function, design, and feasibility
description:
TechnoCube [www.technocube.co] is a Gurgaon, India based IT company which specializes in UI/UX design, web application development as well as data analytics.
Over the past three years we have delivered more than 50 project to multi billion dollar global companies as well innovative startups. We have worked across various categories such as finance, e-learning, publishing and healtcare. We have developed high performance opmtimized applications which are used by more than hundred thousand users.
We have a team of 15 people who are curious and dedicated to build best in class web application as well as intuitive and user friendly design. We have industry leaders as our expert advisors to infuse innovation in our solutions. We work closely on the project at each step be it understanding the use case, suggesting features or managing the product while maintaining the focus in building user centered solutions.
 
 
 
READ MORE...

locations.address: Plot number 23, Maruti Industrial Area, Sector 18
